content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Blue Madonna Matter, from Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar. That story aired February 22, 1959.

(20:53) Next is The Man From Homicide with, The Steve Morton Case. That episode aired August 27, 1951.

Download CaseClosed805

Your support keeps Case Closed  coming every week. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
